nodes.excerpt: Links are the glue of the internet, yet by themselves they're just a string of undecipherable characters. With Peekalink, turn them into rich content your users will be delighted to share and engage in.
nodes.title: Peekalink - An API to magically preview any link ✨
nodes.author: Joel Hernández

localize.description: 链接是互联网的粘合剂，但它们本身只是一串难以辨认的字符。有了Peekalink，将它们转化为丰富的内容，您的用户将乐于分享和参与。
localize.tagline: 一个可以神奇地预览任何链接的API✨。

localize.description: 鏈接是互聯網的粘合劑，但它們本身只是一串難以辨認的字符。有了Peekalink，將它們轉化爲豐富的內容，您的用戶將樂於分享和參與。
localize.tagline: 一個可以神奇地預覽任何鏈接的API✨。

nodes.excerpt: Three.js Journey is the ultimate course if you want to learn Three.js and create stunning 3D websites with WebGL. Let Bruno Simon guide you through more than 30 lessons covering basics and advanced usage of the library.
nodes.title: Three.js Journey - The best course to learn how to create stunning 3D websites
nodes.author: Bruno Simon

localize.description: 如果你想学习Three.js并使用WebGL创建令人惊叹的3D网站，Three.js Journey是终极课程。让Bruno Simon指导你完成30多节课，涵盖库的基础知识和高级用法。
localize.tagline: 学习如何创建令人惊叹的3D网站的最佳课程。

localize.tagline: 學習如何創建令人驚歎的3D網站的最佳課程。

nodes.excerpt: Simple web video game, avalible in english and french. Are you going to find out who the impostor is? Perfect for a short break between two zoom calls.
nodes.title: Undercover game online - Find the impostor
nodes.author: Matteo Le Floch

localize.description: 简单的网络视频游戏，可在英语和法语。你要找出谁是冒牌货吗？完美的两个变焦电话之间的短暂休息。
localize.tagline: 找出冒牌货

localize.description: 簡單的網絡視頻遊戲，可在英語和法語。你要找出誰是冒牌貨嗎？完美的兩個變焦電話之間的短暫休息。
localize.tagline: 找出冒牌貨

nodes.excerpt: Penpot is a free & open source design tool Create beautiful user interfaces in collaboration with your cross-domain teams. Components, low-code, libraries and design systems support! Native SVG! Share, present and test your designs, all in one place.
nodes.title: Penpot - Design freedom for teams
nodes.author: diacritica

localize.description: Penpot是一个免费开源的设计工具，与你的跨领域团队合作创建美丽的用户界面。支持组件、低代码、库和设计系统! 原生SVG! 分享、展示和测试你的设计，都在一个地方。
localize.tagline: 团队的设计自由

localize.description: Penpot是一個免費開源的設計工具，與你的跨領域團隊合作創建美麗的用戶界面。支持組件、低代碼、庫和設計系統! 原生SVG! 分享、展示和測試你的設計，都在一個地方。
localize.tagline: 團隊的設計自由

nodes.excerpt: FreezingCam is an app that lets you freeze your webcam during video calls on purpose! You can also fake a stuttering webcam or even play a video instead of your webcam!
nodes.title: FreezingCam - Freeze your webcam during video calls
nodes.author: Kevin

localize.description: FreezingCam是一款可以让你在视频通话过程中故意冻结你的网络摄像头的应用！你还可以伪造一个口吃的网络摄像头，甚至是播放一个视频来代替你的网络摄像头。你还可以伪造一个口吃的网络摄像头，甚至播放视频，而不是你的网络摄像头!
localize.tagline: 在视频通话时冻结你的网络摄像头

localize.description: FreezingCam是一款可以讓你在視頻通話過程中故意凍結你的網絡攝像頭的應用！你還可以僞造一個口喫的網絡攝像頭，甚至是播放一個視頻來代替你的網絡攝像頭。你還可以僞造一個口喫的網絡攝像頭，甚至播放視頻，而不是你的網絡攝像頭!
localize.tagline: 在視頻通話時凍結你的網絡攝像頭

nodes.excerpt: Synced with calendar, MeetingRule displays the real-time availability of any space and lets you book it directly from the device. This helps start any meeting on time, finish it in time, eliminate unnecessary meetings, and boost the corporate productivity.
nodes.title: MeetingRule - Office space bookings simplified. It just syncs.
nodes.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: 与日历同步，MeetingRule显示任何空间的实时可用性，让你直接从设备上预订。这有助于准时开始任何会议，及时完成会议，消除不必要的会议，提高企业生产力。
localize.tagline: 办公空间预订简化。就是同步。

localize.description: 與日曆同步，MeetingRule顯示任何空間的實時可用性，讓你直接從設備上預訂。這有助於準時開始任何會議，及時完成會議，消除不必要的會議，提高企業生產力。
localize.tagline: 辦公空間預訂簡化。就是同步。

nodes.excerpt: We connect project management software with MS Teams, so you could create tasks and meeting minutes without typing during the call. Focus on conversation, ask call participants for detailed explanations and simply mark from transcription all that’s important.
nodes.title: isLucid - Boost your online meetings efficiency
nodes.author: Vytenis Pakėnas

localize.description: 我们将项目管理软件与MS Teams连接起来，因此您可以在通话过程中无需打字就能创建任务和会议记录。专注于对话，要求电话参与者进行详细解释，并简单地从转录中标记所有重要的内容。
localize.tagline: 提高您的在线会议效率

localize.description: 我們將項目管理軟件與MS Teams連接起來，因此您可以在通話過程中無需打字就能創建任務和會議記錄。專注於對話，要求電話參與者進行詳細解釋，並簡單地從轉錄中標記所有重要的內容。
localize.tagline: 提高您的在線會議效率

nodes.excerpt: Snazzy AI is the fastest, highest quality, GPT-3 powered app on the market. Through a combination of best in class tech from OpenAI and our own ML layer you can quickly create any type of content you can image. And even better, we have a forever free plan.
nodes.title: Snazzy AI - AI-powered content creation. Free for everyone.
nodes.author: Chris Frantz

localize.description: Snazzy AI是市场上速度最快、质量最高、由GPT-3驱动的应用。通过结合OpenAI的一流技术和我们自己的ML层，你可以快速创建任何类型的内容，你可以想象。更妙的是，我们有一个永远免费的计划。
localize.tagline: AI驱动的内容创作。人人免费。

localize.description: Snazzy AI是市場上速度最快、質量最高、由GPT-3驅動的應用。通過結合OpenAI的一流技術和我們自己的ML層，你可以快速創建任何類型的內容，你可以想象。更妙的是，我們有一個永遠免費的計劃。
localize.tagline: AI驅動的內容創作。人人免費。

nodes.excerpt: Follow @Millions on Twitter, pick 6 numbers, and if you match a weekly drawing, you've won $1,000,000. Drawings are weekly and will run for 10 weeks.
nodes.title: Millions - Follow @Millions. Match 6 #s. Win our VC's money.

nodes.excerpt: Organise, share and take notes on web pages, PDFs and academic papers easily. It uses your highlights and automatically generated flashcards alongside spaced repetition, fast feedback loops and more so you can learn faster, remember more and get things done.

nodes.excerpt: CFO Yeah! brings you up close with finance leaders in the most exciting, fastest-growing companies in the world. In each episode, you meet CFOs who believe that finance is another key driver for growth - just as vital as sales and marketing.
nodes.title: CFO Yeah! - Your new favorite finance podcast
nodes.author: Patrick Whatman

localize.description: CFO Yeah！》带您近距离接触世界上最激动人心、发展最快的公司的财务负责人。在每期节目中，您将见到那些相信财务是另一个关键的增长动力的CFO们，他们与销售和营销一样重要。
localize.tagline: 你的新宠财经播客

localize.description: CFO Yeah！》帶您近距離接觸世界上最激動人心、發展最快的公司的財務負責人。在每期節目中，您將見到那些相信財務是另一個關鍵的增長動力的CFO們，他們與銷售和營銷一樣重要。

nodes.excerpt: Fibery is a connected workspace for product teams. It unites user research, ideation, strategic planning, product roadmapping, software development and customer feedback aggregation. Escape scattered tools and make better products with Fibery.
nodes.title: Fibery for Product Teams - All-in-one platform to invent, build and grow your products
nodes.author: Michael Dubakov

localize.description: Fibery是一个产品团队的互联工作空间。它将用户研究、构思、战略规划、产品路线图、软件开发和客户反馈汇总等工作统一起来。摆脱分散的工具，用Fibery做出更好的产品。
localize.tagline: 一体化平台，让您发明、构建和发展您的产品。

localize.description: Fibery是一個產品團隊的互聯工作空間。它將用戶研究、構思、戰略規劃、產品路線圖、軟件開發和客戶反饋彙總等工作統一起來。擺脫分散的工具，用Fibery做出更好的產品。
localize.tagline: 一體化平臺，讓您發明、構建和發展您的產品。

nodes.excerpt: The Real-time WallStreetBets sentiment tracker measures the sentiment in the reddit forum. They also track WSB market sentiment relative to market (SPY) and have a WallStreetBets Index to monitor intraday price action of popular stocks that are discussed

nodes.author: Moritz Wobith

localize.description: 实时WallStreetBets情绪追踪器衡量了reddit论坛中的情绪。他们还跟踪WSB市场情绪相对于市场（SPY），并有一个WallStreetBets指数来监测讨论的热门股票的盘中价格走势。
localize.tagline: 在热门的reddit论坛上测量情绪。

localize.description: 實時WallStreetBets情緒追蹤器衡量了reddit論壇中的情緒。他們還跟蹤WSB市場情緒相對於市場（SPY），並有一個WallStreetBets指數來監測討論的熱門股票的盤中價格走勢。
localize.tagline: 在熱門的reddit論壇上測量情緒。

nodes.title:
I’m starting to think the bull market could last way longer than most ppl think

Robinhood just raised $3+ billion like it came out of thin air

There’s just so much $$$ sloshing around that if we don’t get a face-ripping melt up every correction will continue to be met w/buyers

localize.full_text:
我开始觉得牛市可能会比大多数人想象的持续时间更长

有这么多的美元美元四处游荡，如果我们没有得到一个脸撕裂融化了，每一个修正将继续满足/买家
